DOC.brief_summary: Aims of this study is to characterize the pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic profile and evaluate the safety, efficacy and tolerability, of tamsulosin hydrochloride as treatment in children with a neuropathic bladder, over the course of 12 months of active treatment.
DOC.brief_title: PK/PD, Long-term Safety and Efficacy of Tamsulosin Treatment in Children With Neurogenic Bladder
